project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A customer-facing portal that enables self-service onboarding, knowledge base access, and usage data visualization to reduce churn, improve time-to-value, and increase customer success manager efficiency.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to securely log in using their main SaaS product credentials.
technical_requirements: SSO integration with existing SaaS product

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate display of onboarding tasks based on subscription level
Ability to mark tasks as completed

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Accurate search and retrieval of knowledge base articles

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Accurate representation of customer usage data
Ability to drill down into usage metrics

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
technical_requirements: Seamless integration with CRM and ticketing systems

system_components: Microservices (Customer Data, Usage Data, Knowledge Base)
technical_architecture.data_flow: Customer initiates a request -> API Gateway routes the request to the appropriate microservice -> Microservice retrieves and processes data from the database and other systems -> Microservice returns the response to the API Gateway -> API Gateway sends the response back to the web application
security_considerations: Implement OAuth 2.0 for secure authentication and authorization
Use HTTPS for all communication and TLS 1.2+ encryption
Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict access to sensitive data
Regularly audit and update security measures to comply with ISO 27001 standards

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, including self-service onboarding, knowledge base integration, and usage data visualization.
deliverables: Integrated microservices for customer data, usage data, and knowledge base

implementation_phases.description: Integrate the COSP with the existing CRM and ticketing system to enable efficient customer support and success management.

risk_analysis.description: Potential delays in third-party API integrations (e.g., knowledge base, CRM, ticketing system)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Proactively engage with third-party vendors, establish clear communication channels, and develop contingency plans

risk_analysis.description: Complexity in implementing personalized onboarding checklists based on subscription tiers
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Allocate sufficient time for design and development, involve customer success team in requirements gathering, and conduct thorough testing

risk_analysis.description: Challenges in achieving the target performance and scalability requirements
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement caching, load balancing, and other optimization techniques, conduct performance testing, and plan for infrastructure scaling

tools_and_technologies: AWS (EC2, RDS, ElastiCache, API Gateway, Lambda, CloudWatch)
infrastructure_needs: Scalable cloud-based infrastructure (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure)
Secure and reliable data storage (e.g., PostgreSQL, Redis)
Monitoring and logging solutions (e.g., ELK Stack, AWS CloudWatch)

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months of COSP launch
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer retention data from the main SaaS product

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce average customer TTV (first feature adoption) from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track customer onboarding progress and feature adoption using COSP data

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent by CSMs on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor CSM productivity and time allocation before and after COSP launch

success_metrics.target_value: Increase the percentage of support questions resolved via the portal (without a ticket) to 40%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Analyze customer support data and ticket volume before and after COSP launch
